Introduction

Minwoo was a South Korean singer and actor under TOP Media. He was the leader of the boy group 100%.

On March 25, 2018, he passed away from cardiac arrest in his home in Gangnam, Seoul.

In 2020, Instagram made updates to its application and brought the function of memorializing accounts of those who passed away, so the account become a place full of good memories from the time when they were alive, and so that the account do not get deleted due to inactivity. Minwoo's account was one of those memorialized.
